messages.start:
Hi {}🤗

Experiencing Progress and Joy in the faith?...Awesome!💃🎉
Here's a couple of services I offer😁

• Daily Devotionals 📰
• Latest Sermons 🎶
• Instant notification of service tickets(Lagos branch Only)🔔
and much more...

Excited? Let's get started. Use /help to get a list of available commands

All sermons and devotionals gotten from [Triumph30](triumph30.org) and [Celebration Church International](ccing.org)
messages.sermon_list:
Here's a list of recent CCI sermons

Don't see what you need?
Use /get_sermon to search for the sermon by title

{}
messages.get_sermon: Enter the title of the sermon you wish to get
messages.tickets:
Yay🎉🎉.

Tickets are now available for {}!
Book your seat now!
messages.help:
Here's a list of available commands to use

• /sermon_list - Gets a list of recent CCI Sermons
• /latest_sermon - Stream or download the most recent CCI sermon
• /get_sermon - Get a specific sermon by title
• /get_devotional - Get today's devotional
• /mute - Mute notifications
messages.menu:
What do you want to do today?🤗

• /sermon_list
• /latest_sermon
• /get_sermon
• /get_devotional
• /help
messages.mute:
You have muted notifications from CCI Bot 😞

You won't receive broadcasts from the bot henceforth.

Use /unmute to unmute notifications.
messages.unmute:
Yay🎉

You have unmuted CCI Bot.
messages.empty:
No sermons found with title '{}'

Try again with /get_sermon.
